column2: Role   : Design Manager Designation    : Sr. Manager / AGM  Reporting to : VP - Design Location   : Mumbai (Worli) Experience    : Min. 15 years  Purpose of the Role:  To lead design coordination for Architecture, Interior, Landscape design with all related sub multi design disciplines and regulatory bodies ensuring the design deliverables are coordinated and issued as per SOP aligned to project schedule.  The person should be thorough in research, analysis, design detailing, coordination, presentations, trackers, status updates reports & various stakeholder management. The person shall be Responsible for Coordination for timely and no-error Design deliverables, issuing information to internal stakeholders, Document control, Updating & maintaining timely trackers & Work progress reports. General Appointments Identify Consultants for all design disciplines, prepare RFP including site details, scope with supporting drawings and area tables, drawing deliverables schedule, stages of payment. Prepare and coordinate to get Note for Approvals approved from Leadership as per SOP. Track Consultants schedules and payments. Certify Payments to Consultants as per company SOP. Pre  Acquisition stage  Support for project feasibility  - Coordinate for Regulatory reports - Basic sketches, Massing study, Area tables wrt configuration mix Post-Acquisition stage Design support Prepare Client docket including Design brief, Regulatory brief with supporting site & technical data to be shared with Consultants. Analyze concepts, calculate efficiencies, markups and communicate to Consultants.  Seamless coordination for Architecture including Faade, Interior, and Landscape design with all multi design disciplines and statutory bodies ensuring alignment with project deliverables schedule. Ensure & report design is compliant to statutory norms with least wastage of FSI.  Solve bottlenecks at site in case any RFIs are stuck at site level. Lead regular Design coordination meetings, ensuring capturing Minutes of Meeting & sharing with relevant stakeholders with target dates, action to be taken. Follow up and coordination ensuring the action is taken rightly in terms of quality & quantity with timely response. Take timely signoffs for key stages in appropriate format with annexures. Record keeping in terms of reference and audit backups. Budget and costing support Coordinate for complete set of drawings and details with Technical Specifications from Consultants for Cost Consultant at relevant stages of Cost plans. Support in Value Engineering of design vis a vis costing. Marketing & Branding support Providing complete docket of drawings, details and relevant information for obtaining fee proposals from 3D rendering & physical model agencies for marketing deliverables (Brochures, Avs, Website etc). Seamless coordination between internal (Design, Marketing, Leasing, Leadership) and external (Rendering agency, Design consultant)  Providing technical data, USBs of project. Leasing support Provide Sale plans with relevant Area tables & efficiencies Provide feasibility options for prospective tenants. Regulatory support Check submission drawings to be submitted for Statutory approvals.. Coordinate with Regulatory Consultants for inputs and get the design amended perfectly in least response time. Seamless coordination for exchange of drawings & data for statutory submissions for MCGM CFO, BP, MoEF, AAI, Tree Authority etc. Position Requirement: Criteria Technical    Proficiency in advanced AutoCAD, MS Office ( Excel, Word, Power point) is a must. Knowledge of basic sketch up is preferred for massing studies. Adequate knowledge of the development control regulations of the region  Knowledge of Sketch-up or other 3D software is preferred. Excellent written and spoken Commutations & Presentation Skills.. Behavioral   - Hard working, Sincere , Punctual, Street smart - High sense of Integrity, Ownership & Entrepreneurship. - Confident and ability to deal with multiple stakeholders like Consultants / Peers, seniors / Execution team on daily. basis - Ability to muti task on various projects  - Able Team Management - Commitment to deliver. - Focused, Active, Target & Performance oriented - Naturally resilient, Balanced & Poised, Polite. - Open to Learning, Evolving process, Crossing boundaries - Easy learner. Internal stakeholders Leadership, Business Development, Contracts & Procurement, Execution, Legal, Regulatory, Leasing, Marketing/Branding, Operations/Facility Management. External Stakeholders: Consultants :  Not limited to Architecture, Interior, Landscape, Lighting, Faade, Signages, Traffic, AV-IT, MEP, QS & Cost, Project Management, Fit out D&B agencies Regulatory:  MCGM  BP, CFO , Ward, MoEF, Tree Authority, Airport Authority, Licensed plumber etc. Service providers :  MGL, Tata Power / BEST etc, Vodafone/MTNL, BSEL, Jio etc, Amenity Operators Contractors :  Not limited to General Civil, Landscape, Faade, MEP, Faade cleaning equipment, Signage & Graphics, Interior Suppliers :  Not limited to Light fixtures, finishing materials, Sculptures Glazing, Furniture, JV partners, Development Manager Experience: Atleast 4+ yrs working experience in Premium Grade A  Commercial office , mix use developments preferably with mix exposure to Architecture, Interior & Landscape design. Overall 15+ working experience in premium residential, office, mix use developments. Shall have worked for min. 5 yrs as Project Architect in a reputed design firm. Min 5 yrs as Lead design manager in renowned Mumbai based developer. Educational Qualification B.Arch from a reputed college. Project management course preferred. Candidate must also have knowledge of methods and techniques of Revit. Perks and Benefits Compensation shall be competitive. Growth Opportunities across Hospitality, Residential and Commercial segments.

column2: 6 Days Working |  Alternate Saturday off | Shift Timing: 11:30 AM - 8:30 PM Description We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Manager - Operations to join our team. As a key member of our organization, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing various projects, ensuring smooth operations, and delivering high-quality services to our clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, exceptional organizational skills, and a passion for delivering exceptional experiences. Responsibilities Plan,  coordinate, and execute events and projects from start to finish Manage and delegate tasks to the project team members, ensuring everyone is      working towards project goals and deadlines Collaborate with clients to understand their requirements, provide updates, and address      any concerns or issues that may arise Develop and maintain project timelines, budgets, and resource allocation plans Conduct thorough risk assessments and implement mitigation strategies to minimize      potential threats to project success Oversee vendor selection and contract negotiations to ensure cost-effective and      efficient service delivery Monitor project progress and performance, and provide regular updates to      stakeholders Conduct  post-event evaluations to identify areas for improvement and implement      necessary changes for future projects Requirements Bachelor's  degree in Architecture or Interior Deigning. Proven  experience in project management, preferably within the Exhibition      industry Excellent  organizational and multitasking skills, with the ability to prioritize and      meet deadlines Strong  leadership and team management abilities, with a track record of      successfully managing cross-functional teams Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and      maintain relationships with clients, suppliers, and team members Proficiency in project management software and tools, as well as Microsoft Office      Suite Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills, with the ability to think      critically and adapt to changing project requirements Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects from start to finish

column1: Project Manager-Architect | Retail Exp only | Greater Noida
column2: Experience & Skills required: 6 to 8 years of experience within the retail field (stores & mall) We are seeking a skilled and experienced resource with a background in architecture, specifically within the retail apparel industry. The ideal candidate will possess a strong understanding of retail design principles, execution strategies, and managing Bill of Quantities (BOQ). This role will involve overseeing the design and execution of retail apparel projects from conception to completion, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards. Qualification:   Bachelors degree in Architecture. Proven experience as a Project Manager in the retail apparel industry, with a focus on architectural design and execution. Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, or similar design software. Strong understanding of construction methods, materials, and building codes. Excellent project management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment. Exceptional communication, negotiation, and problem-solving abilities. Familiarity with retail industry trends, consumer behaviour, and market dynamics Roles & Responsibilities:  Design Development: Collaborate with stakeholders to develop design concepts for retail apparel spaces, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and objectives. Provide architectural expertise to create innovative and functional retail environments that enhance the customer experience. Project Planning and Execution: Develop comprehensive project plans, including timelines, milestones, and resource allocation. Coordinate with internal teams, external vendors, and contractors to execute project deliverables efficiently. Monitor project progress, identifying and addressing any issues or delays to ensure on-time delivery. Budget Management: Prepare detailed cost estimates and budgets for each project phase, including material procurement, construction, and finishing. Monitor project expenses closely, identifying cost-saving opportunities and mitigating budget overruns. Quality Control: Establish quality standards for design, construction, and finishing elements of retail apparel projects. Conduct regular site inspections to ensure compliance with specifications and industry standards. Bill of Quantities (BOQ) Management: Develop accurate BOQ documents, detailing quantities and specifications of materials required for construction. Review and analyze BOQ submissions from vendors and contractors, ensuring alignment with project requirements. Stakeholder Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for stakeholders, providing regular updates on project status, milestones, and budgetary concerns. Facilitate effective communication and collaboration between internal teams, external partners, and clients throughout the project lifecycle. Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Role : Project Manager Role Summary:  The Person will own one or multiple project sites to ensure the end-to-end delivery of operational activities, And that the site execution is as per the planned timelines and maintains quality. For this, his responsibilities will include working with other teams to ensure all risks are mitigated and deliverables are completed. Key Responsibilities: Responsible for taking the hand-over of customers from the Business Development Team. Understand the project execution plan and seek clarifications to detail the break-up of activities. Take control of the project right from planning execution to handover and reconciliation. Manage PnL for the assigned business, including direct and indirect expenses. Engage with the customers, and make site visits, to ensure Quality of delivery and adherence to timelines. Prepare BOQ estimates and ensure their timely communication with stakeholders. Work with strategic vendors and channel partnerships in key geographies to ensure on-time delivery. Plan for delivery of subsequent stages and track to ensure that no unplanned risks delay projects. Ensure roadblocks are communicated to all internal stakeholders and removed. Track and update stakeholders on project site progress against project milestones (time and quality). Key metrics will therefore be TAT and quality. Requirements: Experience of 4 to 12 years in Project Management / Site Execution. Minimum 3 years of experience in fit-outs (interiors) for commercial/ office / retail spaces. Ability to work with multiple stakeholders and drive multiple priorities. Good communication - written and verbal. Skills to draw a detailed project plan - identifying different components, and risks therein and putting risk mitigants in place. Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint. Strong aptitude and analytical skills. Education: B. Arch or civil engineers.

column1: Looking For a Project Manager- Sales - Dubai, UAE
column2: Job Title: Project Manager - Business Development Manager Company:  Maintx Decor and technical Services (www.maintxuae.com) Location:  Dubai, UAE About Maintx:  Maintx is a leading provider of interior design and fit-out solutions in the UAE. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, we specialize in delivering high-quality projects that exceed client expectations. Our team is dedicated to creating inspiring spaces that enhance both functionality and aesthetics. Job Description:  Maintx is seeking a dynamic and experienced Project Manager - Business Development Manager to join our team in Dubai, UAE. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in the fit-out industry in the UAE market, with a proven track record of bringing in interior design projects and successfully delivering them on time and within budget. Responsibilities: Develop and implement business development strategies to identify and secure new interior design projects in the UAE market. Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, architects, designers, contractors, and other key stakeholders. Lead the project management process from inception to completion, ensuring that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. Coordinate with internal teams, subcontractors, and vendors to ensure smooth project execution and timely delivery. Prepare and present project proposals, budgets, and timelines to clients, and negotiate contracts and agreements as necessary. Monitor project progress, identify potential risks and challenges, and implement effective solutions to mitigate them. Provide regular updates and reports to senior management on project status, performance, and financial metrics. Stay informed about industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities to identify new business opportunities and maintain a competitive edge. Requirements: Proven experience in the fit-out industry in the UAE market, with a focus on interior design projects. Strong business development skills with a track record of successfully bringing in new projects and expanding client base. Excellent project management abilities, including budgeting, scheduling, and resource allocation. Exceptional communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Ability to build and maintain effective relationships with clients and stakeholders. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Knowledge of local regulations, codes, and standards related to interior design and construction. Proficiency in project management software and Microsoft Office Suite. UAE driving license is preferred.

column2: Position: Project Supervisor (Architect) Location: Poland Industry : Exhibition stand manufacturing Qualification : Diploma or Bachelors in Architecture Roles and Responsibilities : Design Development : Collaborate with clients and internal teams to understand the project requirements and objectives. Create and develop innovative design concepts for exhibition stands while adhering to client specifications and budget limitations. Produce detailed architectural drawings, plans, and layouts using CAD software. Ensure that all designs comply with relevant building codes, regulations, and safety standards. Project Management : Oversee the entire project lifecycle from conceptualization to completion, ensuring timely delivery within budget. Coordinate with various teams, including production, fabrication, installation, and logistics, to ensure smooth execution of projects. Conduct regular site visits to supervise construction and installation activities, ensuring adherence to design intent and quality standards. Monitor project progress, identify potential bottlenecks, and take proactive measures to mitigate risks and resolve conflicts. Client Management : Act as the main point of contact for clients, understanding their needs, and addressing any concerns or queries. Present design concepts and solutions to clients, incorporating their feedback and integrating changes into the project. Build and maintain strong client relationships by providing exceptional service, managing expectations, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Effectively communicate project updates, timelines, and milestones to clients, ensuring transparency and clarity. Team Supervision : Lead and manage a team of architects and designers, providing guidance, mentoring, and support as needed. Assign tasks and responsibilities to team members, ensuring a balanced workload and efficient utilization of resources. Conduct performance evaluations, provide constructive feedback, and identify training and development opportunities for team members. Foster a collaborative and positive work environment, promoting teamwork, creativity, and a commitment to excellence. Budget and Cost Control : Prepare project cost estimates and budgets, considering all relevant factors such as materials, labor, subcontractors, and project duration. Monitor project expenditures, track costs, and implement measures to control expenses and maximize profitability. Evaluate supplier and vendor proposals, negotiate contracts, and ensure timely procurement of materials and services at competitive prices. Assist in the preparation of project financial reports, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company policies and procedures. Prepare BOQ estimates and ensure their timely communication with stakeholders. Work with strategic vendors and channel partnerships in key geographies to ensure on-time delivery. Plan for delivery of subsequent stages and track to ensure that no unplanned risks delay projects. Ensure roadblocks are communicated to all internal stakeholders and removed. Ability to work with multiple stakeholders and drive multiple priorities. Good communication - written and verbal. column1: Onsite Project Architect cum Interior Coordinator
column2: Role & responsibilities     Talented, competent & self-motivated Architect to co-ordinate Architectural & Interior works at Trivandrum site, whose main role will be: To represent M/s. Sudhakar Pai Associates (SPA) at proposed Trivandrum site for the entire duration of project, or as required. To study, understand the overall intent, requirement & goal of the project, and to interpret the details & construction drawings issued to site from SPA Main Office. To work & co-ordinate with other Consultants of the project, to provide assistance to appointed Project Managers and Contractor/s or Vendor/s and to be a connecting bridge between SPA Main Office and above site team/s by interpreting information provided in the GFC drawings & construction document/s, to revise them, if necessary, in consultation with SPA Main Office and Client. To co-ordinate and to clarify/ sort out any technical issue/s arising out as per prevailing site condition/s in correlation with issued GFC drawings. To review and take appropriate action on Contractors submissions forwarded by PMC, including shop drawings, product data, samples, request for information (RFIs) and request for clarifications (RFCs), in coordination with SPA Main Office. To supervise & monitor construction works and report any quality issues to PMC team & Client in consultation with SPA Main Office. To represent SPA in the Design Review Meetings (DRMs) & Weekly Progress Review Meetings (WPRs) and any other coordination meetings. To check and confirm on the site markings as per the issued GFC drawings and to inform, co-ordinate with the respective team member/s at SPA Main Office and to provide solutions / resolution / instruction to site team, accordingly. Knowledge of MS Office, Autocad & Rivet is essential. Preferred candidate profile     Graduate in Architecture / Civil Engineering, capable of managing and handling both Architectural and Interior Works at Trivandrum Site.  Knowledge of MS Office, Autocad & Rivet is essential.
column11: Project Architecture, Interior Designing, Interior Architecture, Architectural Design

column2: We are looking for design innovation-centric individuals to be a part of Darwin Projects, a prefabricated building design company and international award-winning start-up based in Ahmedabad with prospective projects around the country.          A candidate with strong interpersonal skills and the ability to multitask is a perfect fit         Junior Architects work under the direct supervision of an Architect or Lead Designer, assisting in a variety of tasks pertaining to research, design, detail and execution of the built environment.            Roles and Responsibilities            Meet with clients to determine objectives and requirements for structures         Give preliminary estimates on cost and construction time         Prepare conceptual, architectural and construction drawings         Graphics for branding/marketing      3Ds and renderings     Coordinate execution team and consultants         Assist in material and vendor selection         Commiserate to skills and experience     House of MG, Ahmedabad     1-3 years     Bachelor of Architecture          Software skills required : AutoCAD, Adobe suite and SketchUp are a must. Rhino, Revit and Enscape/ Vray are a plus. Familiarity with AI tools will be given a preference           Education           Interest or experience in prefabricated construction, modular buildings and architectural products and systems would be preferred.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Project Manager Project Manager on Architecture   / Interior projects and coordinating with Design team members and   sub-consultants with other stake holders including Client. Responsibilities   include: Establish   Project Planning, preparing Master Schedule, key milestones, and budget in consultation with the Design team. Monitor   and ensure key design milestones are achieved during the project as per the   established schedule. Coordinate with the Client, and other Consultants/stakeholders to achieve the milestones. Manage and mitigate risks, resolve issues and ensure compliance by facilitating effective communication and collaboration among project teams. Assist in Procurement / Tendering management in formulating Tender conditions. Coordinate with appointed PMC and seek progress of work from them. Coordinate, and organize key client meetings, project status meetings, and site meetings. Preferred candidate profile     PMP / PGDM / DBM from a recognized National / International Institute Degree in Civil Engineering / Architecture from a recognized Indian University Experience working on Architectural and Interior projects.  Candidate must have hands-on knowledge of Project Management, Tender, and Architectural Design Process. Familiarity with specifications and site protocols Proficiency in MS Projects, Excel, Word, PowerPoint and AutoCAD

column2: Role & responsibilities     Overseeing design and design coordination at the site, preparing working plans, detail drawings from rough/detailed sketches, notes and coordinating activities. Coordination with consultants, clients, and site engineers. Preparation of basic master plans and floor plans as per requirement Should be able to get shop drawings done. Should have exposure to statutory codes / Building norms, high-end finishes, joinery works, wall finishes, facades, structural glazing, wall claddings, interior works and MEP Works. Coordination with site representatives of the services team and finishing agencies. Handling projects right after design drawings to coordinate with various consultants to freeze the work on the design. Preparing & working detail of drawings, set for construction. Regular site observation & check to ensure the working on site as per architecture. Site coordination. Ensuring all designs meet industry standards and government regulations Good knowledge in Structural & Architectural Design Coordination of MEP Services works like Electrical, IBMS, Plumbing, HVAC, Fire fighting, and other auxiliary works. Preparing building models and structure plans Creating blueprints and making alterations based on the feedback from the Project Undertaking regular site visits and inspections Preferred candidate profile     Bachelors degree in Architecture Engineering      or a related discipline. 10-15 years of experience as an Architect in a      reputed architectural firm or construction company Knowledge in AutoCad. Should have handled Commercial,      Residential, Hospitals, IT Parks & Interior fit out projects. Basic understanding of the rules and      regulations governing the Construction industry Familiarity with design software like Adobe      Photoshop and 3d Studio VIZ Highly creative and detail-oriented      individual  Up-to-date with the latest architectural      designs and trends Strong project management and time management      skills Good communication skills Having an eye for detail Demonstrating good leadership skills Deadline-driven and highly motivated      individual Good analytical and problem-solving skills Perks and benefits

column2: Enhance overall technical capacity of the organization through detailed planning, design and liaison support . Ideal candidate to have worked in the liaison, design and development team of a developer or a reputed architect firm and should have cleared environmental clearance. Familiarity with all local body NOC s is a must.        Roles and Responsibilities:         Compliance of all statutory approvals received (EC,MPCB, PMC, Royalty, All Local body NOC s,MSEB,RERA etc.)     Verify RERA budgets and project completion milestones      Indian Green Building council certification documentation and liaison with all consultants to achieve final green building rating     Concept plans detailed verification for constructability, efficiency and local statutory requirements.      Preparation and interface with Environmental consultant for drawings and appropriate EC documentation ,project monitoring reports and help manage site environmental parameters     Verification of PMC municipal drawings with site conditions and record the appropriate plan differences      Interaction with liaison architect/ municipal office/PMC /Environment consultant office to enhance plan approval/NOC s required to begin construction      Good for construction drawing verification for all the departments / consultants / stakeholders of project      Support during material selection/contractor selection     Periodic site visit to help and reduce drawing issues faced by site team.      Enhance fa ade design for commercial projects.          Desired Candidate Profile:         Required    : Graduate of Architecture/Civil engineering with 6 or more years of experience Architecture and Planning in Commercial Real Estate     Autocad latest version, 3D maxx, google sketch up, Revit, excell, Photoshop and have good knowledge of local bylaws, EC, RERA, IGBC and all NOC requirements.     Excellent verbal and written communication skills;      Bright, motivated, self-starter and proactive personality who is comfortable working independently as we have a lean setup;     Should speak fluent English, Hindi and preferably Marathi;     Excellent Organizational Skills and Time Management;      Excellent leadership and people skills;      Excellent interpersonal skills - Can interact with all kinds of people.      Experience in the fields of PMC/PMRDA/PCMC DP compliance
